title: Trump warns UK against doing business with China after Starmer visits Beijing – UK politics live
summary_full: It comes after the US president threatened to impose tariffs on Canada if it went through with economic deals struck with ChinaGood morning, Taz Ali here to bring you the latest news in UK politics.The US president, Donald Trump, said it was “very dangerous” for the UK to deal with China moments after Keir Starmer announced a successful trip to Beijing, where he discussed business with Chinese leader Xi Jinping. Continue reading...
